text: of getting rid of that chap, Hewitt, too. Leave it to me.'O.K.,Bob, but watch you step. He's a tough customer, mark my words, Harry said in a low voice. Bone half smiled in the darkness.'Ill remember', he said. 'Good night, Harry.'Good night, Bob.' He Paused hatred of Stevie Hewit.
